column2: "If only ARKS members could share some of their abilities with the rest of us. There's so much that I could do, if only..."
"I can't help but think that if I could have been an ARKS member myself, my fieldwork would go much smoother."
"That's why I think so much of Aki, who is both an ARKS member and a scientist."
"I wonder why nobody is researching how to acquire the abilities needed to become an ARKS operative."
"Perhaps I ought to look into it myself. I think I'd need some help to pull it off, though."
"When you study geology and know how a planet is formed, that leads to an understanding of what kinds of resources can be found under its surface."
"It's an extremely useful field, but it's not very glamorous, I'm afraid."

"My research would have suffered serious setbacks if I hadn't met you,
<%me>."
"I will be forever in your debt. I can't thank you enough for your help. No one else would even hear me out."
"Those who hesitate when given the chance to perform essential research are not true scientists. I have to go there."
"Do you see scientists like us as being paranoid and strange? I guess that's only natural."
"Scientists must have an inquisitive mind. When you no longer have passion for your work, you're done for. So I've learned to accept who I am."
"Thank you so much. I'll be in touch if I have any other requests. Good luck to you."
"This place is a home base for ARKS. I wonder if the Darkers have a base as well?"
"Just between you and me, the official records contain a number of inconsistencies. One day I'd like to get to the bottom of things."
"There are quite a few other scientists in ARKS, but few of them study Photons."
"Very little data has been disclosed. I wonder why that is? This area of study is core to how ARKS work."
"When you seek the truth, you must accept the associated risks. I don't regret the path I have chosen, no matter the outcome."
"Photons aren't the only area where data is lacking. The same is true for Darkers. Strange, don't you think?"
"I requested some Photon research data the other day, but I have yet to be given access. What could be taking so long?"

"しばらく見ないうちに、ここの装いも
変わっていて、びっくりしました。"

"何事も変わっていくものなんですね。
私も、立ち止まってはいられません。"

"惑星リリーパは、砂漠地帯だけあって
すごく乾燥していました。
気候が全然違いましたね。"

"よく口や目に砂が入りましたよ。
慣れるまでは大変でした。"

"でも、今となってはいい経験でした。
学べることも多くありましたし
そうそう出来る事じゃありませんから。"

"今では、リリーパに逗留できたこと
とても貴重な経験だと思っています。"

"現地へ赴き、研究をする。
なかなか出来る事じゃありません。"

"今、その成果をまとめているんです。
結構な量になりそうですが
書かずにはいられないんですよ。"

"おそらくすべての研究に言えますが
ともかくデータを積み重ねることです。"

"どんな些細なことでも、調べ続ける。
リリーパの研究は、その大切さを
私に教えてくれました。"

"今、そのデータや研究内容の
役立つ時がきています。
研究者冥利に尽きますね。"

"私は自分が行なってきた研究を
誇りに思っております。"

"リリーパで積み重ねた研究内容が
ああやって役に立ちましたから。"

"これからも私は研究に励みます。
学者として、その本分を全うするべく
努力を重ねていきますよ。"

"また私が行なった研究が
貴方にとってもアークスにとっても
役立てることを願っています。"

"リリーパで行なってきた研究データは
今、改めて見なおしています。"

"一見すると同じ成分でも
構成パターンが違ったりしますし
まだまだ解明の余地があります。"

"新たな発見があると嬉しいですね。
研究に終わりはありませんから。"

"私はアークスではありませんが……
貴方の力になりたいと思っています。"

"微力ではありますが
私に協力できることがあれば
なんでも言ってください。"

"<%me>さん。
今回の出来事についてですが
学ばせて頂いたことがあります。"

"何よりも強い気持ちを持っていれば
望んだ未来を引き寄せられる、と。"

"青臭いことかもしれませんが
願いを叶えた貴方の姿を見ると
そういう風に思うんですよ。"

"研究者として、やれることを
精一杯やろうと思っています。"

"貴方を見ていると
そういう前向きな気持ちになります。
私も負けてられません。"

"<%me>.
Did you come all the way out here to see me? I'm... I'm touched, really."
"It's been a long time. We've been waiting two years for you to return."
"I figured I'd be turned down, but I applied for permission to study the Earth anyway. Sure enough, I was denied."
"There's all this weird stuff going on, and it turned out there's people over there, so I guess Command are trying to avoid getting their attention."
"We have no idea what they're even capable of, so it makes sense to be cautious."
"Hello, <%me>. Is something up?"
"...A visitor from another world, huh? Intriguing."
"If they crash-landed on Naberius, maybe the data I've been gathering there will be useful..."
"Oh, they need technical help? Well, I can't say no to somebody in need. I'd be happy to help out."
